text.name: TextDescLong
text.text: The UK version of the Sega Magazine was a monthly magazine devoted to the many Sega consoles of the early 1990s, including the Sega Master System, Sega Mega Drive (plus Sega Mega-CD and Sega 32X accessories), Sega Game Gear and eventually Sega Saturn.
